mapper.select: SELECT r.reply_idx, m.member_nickname, r.reply_content, r.reply_write_date from members as m join replies as r on m.member_idx = r.member_idx where r.post_idx = #{postIdx} order by r.reply_idx desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replies (post_idx, reply_content, member_idx, reply_parent_no, reply_depth_no, reply_orderid) VALUES (#{postIdx}, #{replyContent}, #{memberIdx}, 0, 0, 0)
